00013 class QString;
00019 template<class function_type>
00020         class CustomFunctionBase {
00021     public:
00022         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00023         QString symbolic ();
00024         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00025 
00026     protected:
00027         bool loadFunction (const QString &);
00028         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00029         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00030 
00031         function_type *func;
00032         void *handle;
00033         bool valid;
00034 };

00040         public Function,

00042     public:
00043         CustomFunction (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00044                         double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00045                         double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00046                         bool final = true);
00047         virtual ~CustomFunction();
00048 
00049     protected:
00050         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double);
00051 };

00099 #include <dlfcn.h>
00100 
00104 template<class function_type>
00105         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName) {
00106     const char *error;
00107 
00108     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00109     if (!handle) {
00110         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00111         return false;
00112     }
00113 
00114     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00115     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00116         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00117         return false;
00118     }
00119 
00120     return true;
00121 }
00122 
00125 template<class function_type>
00126         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00127     typedef char* STRING;
00128     STRING (*sym)();
00129     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00130     const char *error;
00131     static char *ret;
00132 
00133     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00134         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00135         return QString ("something");
00136     }
00137     ret=(*sym)();
00138     return QString (ret);
00139 }
